author: Special Correspondent
text:
The life-jackets came to the rescue of a couple, when a self-pedalling boat capsized in Yercaud Lake on Monday afternoon.

V. Vijay (29), of Ganapathipalayam in Salem city, and his wife Vishnupriya were enjoying boating in the lake, when the boat suddenly capsized. As both were wearing life-jackets, they were floating in the lake water.

The Tamil Nadu Tourism Development Corporation employees rushed to the spot in motor-fitted boats and rescued both of them and brought them to the boat house. S. Venkatesan, Senior Manager, TN Tourism Development Corporation Limited, R. Murali, Town Panchayat president and officials visited the boat house.
title: Boat capsizes in lake, couple escapes
